title: MacOS version python control 'CommandHistory' doesn't appear to 'work'
question: when I try, under ‘Python’ control to do a "CommandHistory’ - I do not ‘appear’ to get any output, at least not where I want it? - am I an idjit, or is there a secret, or does this command (which ‘seems’ to work in Windows PC version) not ‘quite’ work, yet, in MacOS?

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
text=rs.CommandHistory()
rs.MessageBox(text)
code_blocks.author: Helvetosaur
